py4j

Class Gateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • py4j.Gateway

  • public class Gateway
extends Object

    A Gateway manages various states: entryPoint, references to objects returned to a Python program, etc.

    This class is not intended to be directly accessed by users.

    Author:
    Barthelemy Dagenais
